structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Repealed 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 172, sec. 91. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 176, sec. 3.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Membership of board of zoning adjustment and appeals; appointment; qualifications; term; vacancies; oath; removal; compensation.
